"Mining Rig Defense":
"\"Mining Rig Defense\" is an Emergency Quest in which you protect Resource Mining Rigs from enemy attack.

As with other Emergency Quests, occurrences will be announced in advance, and a start point will be displayed on the World Map."

"Enemies come intermittently in \"Waves\". Your objective is to protect the Rigs long enough to survive the final Wave.

You can read more information about Mining Rig Defense Emergency Quests by selecting \"System\" from the Main Menu, selecting \"Help\", then selecting \"Game Guide\"."
